channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: And We Are Live
item.description: Welcome! Often when doing a project I learn something and want to share. So here we are. Expect a mix of electronics, coding, 3d printing, home automation and some wheelchair rugby. Maybe a bit of ADHD/ASD content as when your car runs like a sports car you need to find the right track to put your foot down or a speed bump is going to get you.
